name: opqclick/currency-converter
description:
The task is to create a Laravel package, this package
will expose an API GET endpoint that will receive the
following params:
● amount
● currency to exchange
You can assume the default currency is Euro.
This endpoint should return the exchange rate for the
given amount in the same standard format as the
other API endpoints.
The package must fetch the exchange rate of the day
from the European Central Bank daily reference.
The package must have unit tests documentation
and a readme.md file.
The package must be installed with composer as a
local dependency.
